LandingPage.subtitle: Easily generate and manage QR codes
LandingPage.step2: Click the "Create QR Code" button on the dashboard.
LandingPage.step3: Enter the information you want in the QR code, such as URL or text.
LandingPage.step4: Download or share the generated QR code.
